comments.body:
this line is wrong, as the compiler is thinking it's just a function that must return `RemoteObjSpec | boolean`

it should be `boolean | (remobeObj: RemoteObjSpec) => RemoteObjSpec`

or put some parenthesis around

Thanks for finding @pocesar. I've updated with the fix and submitted a new PR.
https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/19695

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +88,92 @@	If set, data is remote (use also fetchInfo)
	*/
	remote?: (remobeObj: RemoteObjSpec) => RemoteObjSpec | boolean,	// Updated to support ^3.0.0
	/**
	Use keyField to tell table which column is unique. This is same as isKey in <TableHeaderColumn>
